channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- Facebook Thrift
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- Facebook Thrift

item.title: CVE-2021-24028|2024-08-03T19:21:17.258Z -- facebook -- facebook%20thrift
item.description: An invalid free in Thrift's table-based serialization can cause the application to crash or potentially result in code execution or other undesirable effects. This issue affects Facebook Thrift prior to v2021.02.22.00.
